name: jetlog
tagline: A web based pilot logbook for tracking flights and hours
description: Jetlog is a pilot logbook application for tracking flights, aircraft and hours. It provides a web based interface for entering and reviewing entries and can be self hosted by pilots or flying clubs wanting digital records under their control.

features.title: Flight Logging
features.description: Record flights, Track hours, Aircraft details. Maintain comprehensive pilot records

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Digital entries, Export reports, Regulatory compliance. Professional flight documentation

features.title: Statistics & Reports
features.description: Flight time analysis, Currency tracking, Experience summaries. Monitor your aviation progress
